name: Republic Corvette
Lore: 'Multi-purpose Rebel Blockade Runner. Modular interior designed for troop or cargo transport. 150 meters long. Used by Rebels, pirates, corporations and the Empire.',
Text: 'May add 3 Republic pilots and 4 passengers. Quad Laser Cannons may not deploy aboard. Permanent pilot provides ability of 2. While with an Imperial-class Star Destroyer, power +1.',
